info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 6:24PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southern Hamilton, southwestern Warren, central Fulton, northern Saratoga and southeastern Herkimer Counties through 715 PM EST... At 623 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds near Stratford, or 14 miles north of Little Falls, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Warrensburg, Lake George Village, Corinth, Dolgeville, Edinburg, Northville, Wells, Stratford, Cranberry Creek, Day Center, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Caroga Lake, Glens Falls North, Caroga Lake Public Campground, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Sacandaga Campground, Queensbury and South Glens Falls. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
